content: hi everyone in this tutorial i ll show you how to crochet a pouch that transforms into a bucket hat this project was inspired by the super cool foldable crochet market bags this pocket bucket hat is perfect for when you need a bucket hat on the go making it easy to organize and pack it also makes a unique and easy crochet gift for friends and family if you recreate this i would love to see it so be sure to tag me on insta @itkenken or tiktok @_itskenken_ so i can like & share your post ty for watching
